title: Senior UX Designer Assessment
description: Comprehensive assessment for Senior UX Designer position focusing on core competencies and advanced skills required for success in this role.

sections.title: Senior Skills - Fundamentals
sections.description: Core technical and foundational skills assessment for senior ux designer position

questions.title: What is the first phase of the design thinking process?
Which are essential UX research methods? (Select all that apply)
What is the primary purpose of wireframing?
Which tool is most commonly used for UI/UX design?
What are key principles of good UX design? (Select all that apply)

sections.title: Senior Skills - Advanced Concepts
sections.description: Advanced concepts and professional practices for senior ux designer position

questions.title: What is a user journey map?

options.text: A visualization of user experience across touchpoints

questions.title: Which are important accessibility considerations? (Select all that apply)
What does responsive design mean?

options.text: Design adapts to different screen sizes

questions.title: What is information architecture in UX?
Which metrics are important for UX success? (Select all that apply)
